elementalcraft.landing: $(thing)ElementalCraft$() is a magic mod based around the 4 $(thing)elements$(): $(thing)fire$(), $(thing)water$(), $(thing)earth$() and $(thing)air$().
elementalcraft.category.instruments.desc: $(thing)Instruments$() are the main crafting tools in $(thing)ElementalCraft$().$(br)They consume $(thing)elements$() and require to be on top of a $(ec:tank)Container$().
elementalcraft.category.crafting.desc: Here is everything you need to know about $(thing)Crafting$().
elementalcraft.category.shrines.desc: $(thing)Shrines$() are powerful tools that channel $(thing)elements$() in the world around them to act on it.
elementalcraft.category.spells.desc: Spells allows you to directly affect the world around you.
elementalcraft.page.source0: $(thing)Sources$() are naturally occurring spots where $(thing)elements$() converge.$(br2)It's strongly recommended to explore a bit and find $(thing)sources$() at least one for each $(thing)element$().$(br)It is also recommended to mark their spot to find them back easier when you need them.
elementalcraft.page.inertcrystal0: To get $(item)Inert Crystal$() start digging underground and mine $(item)Inert Crystal Ore$().
elementalcraft.page.containedcrystal0: $(item)Contained Crystals$() are the main components of $(thing)instruments$().$(br)By coating an $(item)Inert Crystal$() with $(thing)gold$() you are able to prevent it to get altered by $(thing)elements$() without lousing its ability to interact with them.
elementalcraft.page.elementpipe0: $(item)Pipes$() are used to transport $(thing)elements$() across distance, their main use is to provide $(thing)instruments$() with the required $(thing)element$().$(br2)you can configure a $(item)pipe$() by right clicking a section or the core to change it from $(thing)connected$(), $(thing)disconnected$(), $(thing)insert$() or $(thing)extract$().$(br2)$(item)Pipes$() existe in three tiers: impaired, normal and improved.
elementalcraft.page.whiterock0: $(item)Whiterock$() is $(thing)earth infused$() $(item)stone$().$(br)It is used in the crafting of advanced $(thing)instruments$() and $(thing)shrines$().$(br)To get it simply put $(item)stone$(). in an $(ec:infuser).
elementalcraft.page.element_holder0: $(item)Element Holders$() can hold $(thing)elements$(), for transport or use by $(thing)spells$().$(br)To fill them hold right click on a $(thing)source$() of the same $(thing)element$() type. You can also transpher $(thing)element$() back to a receiver by holding right click on it.
elementalcraft.page.focus0: A $(item)focus$() can hold multiple $(thing)spells$().$(br)You can add $(thing)spells$() to it by putting the $(item)focus$() in an $(intem)anvil$() with the $(item)scroll$() of the $(thing)spell$().You can circle through $(thing)spells$() by holding shift and scrolling.
elementalcraft.page.spell_desk0: To craft $(thing)spells$() you need first nedd to craft $(item)spell desk$().$(br)To use it just rightclick it with some $(item)paper$() and then with som $(item)infused crystal$(), the bigger the crystal stack the more chance you will have to get a spell, the resulting spell is allinged with the same $(thing)element as the used crystal.
elementalcraft.page.tank0: The $(item)Element Container$() is a an advanced $(thing)element$() storage, it can store more $(thing)elements$() than the $(ec:tank_small)Small Container$() and is compatible with all $(thing)instruments$().
elementalcraft.page.extractor0: Use an $(item)Extractor$() to extract $(thing)elements$() form $(ec:source)sources$().$(br2)To do so place the $(item)Extractor$() above a $(ec:tank)Container$() and below the $(ec:source)source$() you want to extract.
elementalcraft.page.infuser0: Now that you can extract $(thing)elements$() it's time to infuse it.$(br2)To do so you need an $(item)Infuser$() and put it on top of a $(ec:tank)Container$().$(br)D'ont forget to connect it to the $(ec:extractor)Extractor$()'s $(ec:tank)Container$() with a $(ec:pipe)pipe$().
elementalcraft.page.tank_small0: The $(item)Small Element Container$() is a simple $(thing)element$() storage, it can $(thing)elements$() provide to $(thing)instruments$().$(br2)All $(thing)instruments$() need to be placed on top of a $(item)Container$() to operate.$(br)The $(item)Small Element Container$() can only work with $(ec:extractor)Extractors$() and $(ec:infuser)Infusers$().$(br)You can also transfer $(thing)elements$() from one $(item)Container$() to another using $(ec:pipe)pipes$().
elementalcraft.page.binder0: The $(item)Binder$() is one of the most important $(thing)Instrument$(), it allows Channeling $(thing)elements$() to combine multiples items together.$(br)Be careful because the order in witch you put the Items is important.$(br)As for any other $(thing)Instruments$(), the $(item)Binder$() needs to be on top of a $(ec:tank)Container$(). but not a $(ec:tank_small)Small Container$().
elementalcraft.page.firefurnace0: The $(item)Fire Furnace$() smelt items by using $(thing)fire element$() instead of fuel.$(br)As for any other $(thing)Instruments$(), the $(item)Fire Furnace$() needs to be on top of a $(ec:tank)Container$(). but not a $(ec:tank_small)Small Container$().It consumes $(thing)fire$().
elementalcraft.page.fireblastfurnace0: The $(item)Fire Blast Furnace$() is the $(item)Blast Furnace$() variant of the $(ec:firefurnace)Fire Furnace$().$(br)As for any other $(thing)Instruments$(), the $(item)Fire Blast Furnace$() needs to be on top of a $(ec:tank)Container$(). but not a $(ec:tank_small)Small Container$().It consumes $(thing)fire$().
elementalcraft.page.extractor_improved0: The $(item)Improved Extractor$() is an advanced version of the $(ec:extractor)Extractor$(). It extract $(thing)elements$() faster.$(br)As for any other $(thing)Instruments$(), the $(item)Improved Extractor$() needs to be on top of a $(ec:tank)Container$(). but not a $(ec:tank_small)Small Container$().
elementalcraft.page.purifier0: The $(item)Purifier$() takes $(item)ores$() and purify them to create $(item)Pure ores$() at a ration of one to two. You can then smelt them into $(item)ingots$() in any $(item)Furnaces$().$(br)As for any other $(thing)Instruments$(), the $(item)Improved Extractor$() needs to be on top of a $(ec:tank)Container$(). but not a $(ec:tank_small)Small Container$().$(br)It consumes $(thing)earth$().
elementalcraft.page.infusion0: To infuse an item simply right click the $(ec:infuser)Infuser$() while holding the item you want to infuse.$(br)Try it now with an $(item)Inert Crystal$().
elementalcraft.page.infusion1: $(thing)Infusion$() can aslo be applied to $(item)tools$(), improving existing $(thing)enchantments$() or giving them new unique abilities.
elementalcraft.page.binding0: $(thing)Binding$() is done by rightclicking a $(ec:binder)Binder$() with all the $(item)ingredients$() in the correct order.
elementalcraft.page.shrinebase0: This is the building block of all $(thing)shrines$().
elementalcraft.page.firepylon0: The $(item)Fire Pylon$() is a $(thing)Shrine$() that set fire to nearby $(thing)creatures$().$(br2)It consumes $(thing)fire element$().
elementalcraft.page.oreshrine0: The $(item)Ore Shrine$() excavate $(thing)ores$() underneath it.$(br2)It consumes $(thing)earth element$().
elementalcraft.page.lavashrine0: The $(item)Lava Shrine$() melt $(item)stone$() above it into $(item)lava$().$(br2)It consumes $(thing)fire element$().
elementalcraft.page.sweetshrine0: The $(item)Sweet Shrine$() periodically refill hunger and boost nearby $(thing)bees$() production.$(br2)It consumes $(thing)water element$().
elementalcraft.page.vacuumshrine0: The $(item)Vacuum Shrine$() pull towards it nearby $(item)items$() and store them in the container below it.$(br2)It consumes $(thing)air element$().
elementalcraft.page.growthshrine0: The $(item)Growth Shrine$() accelerate $(thing)crops$() growth above it.$(br2)It consumes $(thing)water element$().
elementalcraft.page.harvestshrine0: The $(item)Harvest Shrine$() harvest $(thing)crops$() below it.$(br2)It consumes $(thing)earth element$().
elementalcraft.page.overloadshrine0: The $(item)Overload Shrine$() boost the speed of the $(item)block$() its facing.$(br2)It consumes $(thing)air element$().
elementalcraft.page.enderlockshrine0: The $(item)Ender Lock Shrine$() channels $(thing)water$() through the ender matrix preventing anything passing through it.$(br)Near it $(thing)endermen$() can't teleport, $(item)ender pearls$() or $(l:elmentalcraft:spells/ender_strike)Ender strinke$() d'ont works.$(br2)It consumes $(thing)water element$().
elementalcraft.page.receptacle0: $(item)Receptacles$() are powerful tools that allow you to move $(ec:source)source$().
elementalcraft.page.pureinfuser0: The $(item)Pure Infuser$() is the mos powerfull crafting tool. It uses $(item)pedestals$() to channel all four $(thing)elements$() into a single item.$(br)to operate it needs to be circle with each of the four $(item)pedestals$(), each being provided with the correct $(thing)element$() using $(ec:pipe)improved pipes$().$(br)Once this setup is done you can start crafting by puting the correct $(item)ingredient$() on each $(thing)pedestal$() and the main on on the $(thing)pure infuser$().
elementalcraft.page.purerock0: $(item)Pure Rock$() is an extremely strong stone that is able to resist some of the most powerful blasts event a $(thing)Wither$().
elementalcraft.page.instrument_retriever: The $(item)Instrument Output Retriever$() is a finely twicked machine that can interact with $(thing)instruments$() and handle their output for themself, allowing you to extract their output upon completed crafting and store it in a $(item)chest$() for exemple.$(br2)You ca reoriente its input and output by right clicking them.
elementalcraft.page.fireball0: Throw a $(thing)fire ball$() in the dirrection you are looking at.$(br)Consumes $(thing)fire$().
elementalcraft.page.gravelfall0: Summon a column of $(item)gravel$() above the targeted $(thing)block$() or $(thing)entity$().$(br)Consumes $(thing)earth$() and three $(item)gravel$().
elementalcraft.page.stonewall0: Summon a three by three $(thing)stone wall$() in front of you to protect you from attacks.$(br)Consumes $(thing)earth$() and nine $(item)stone$().
elementalcraft.page.ender_strike0: Teleport behind targeted $(thing)entity$() or closest $(thing)monster$() and strike it with increased damage. Be careful not to use it near an $(l:elmentalcraft:shrines/enderlockshrine)Ender lock shrine$().$(br)Consumes $(thing)air$().
elementalcraft.page.purification0: Remove all negative $(thing)effects$() on you or the targeted $(thing)entity$().$(br)Consumes $(thing)water$().
elementalcraft.page.flame_cleave0: Hit all $(thing)entities$() around you with a burnig circular attack.$(br)Consumes $(thing)fire$().
elementalcraft.page.inferno0: Breath fire in front of you dealing damage to all the $(thing)entities$() in a cone.$(br)Consumes $(thing)fire$().
elementalcraft.page.silk_vein0: Mine a whole $(thing)ore vein$() with silk touch.$(br)Consumes $(thing)earth$().
